image_grid_column_gap.label: Grid Column Gap
image_grid_column_gap.description: Set the size of the gap between the image and the content.

image_grid_row_gap.label: Grid Row Gap
image_grid_row_gap.description: Set the size of the gap if the grid items stack.

image_grid_breakpoint.label: Grid Breakpoint
image_grid_breakpoint.description: Set the breakpoint from which grid items will stack.

image_margin.label: Margin Top
image_margin.description: Set the top margin. Note that the margin will only apply if the content field immediately follows another content field.

image_svg_inline.label: Inline SVG
image_svg_inline.description: Inject SVG images into the page markup so that they can easily be styled with CSS.

image_svg_color.label: SVG Color
image_svg_color.description: Select the SVG color. It will only apply to supported elements defined in the SVG.

image_text_color.label: Text Color
image_text_color.description: Set light or dark color mode for text, buttons and controls if a sticky transparent navbar is displayed above.

link_margin.label: Margin Top

drop_width.label: Width

title_font_family.label: Font Family
title_font_family.description: Select an alternative font family. Mind that not all styles have different font families.

title_color.label: Color
title_color.description: Select the text color. If the Background option is selected, styles that don't apply a background image use the primary color instead.

_layout.description: Customize the column widths of the selected layout and set the column order. Changing the layout will reset all customizations.

columns.label: Columns
columns.description: Define a background style or an image of a column and set the vertical alignment for its content.

column_gap.label: Column Gap
column_gap.description: Set the size of the gap between the grid columns.

row_gap.label: Row Gap
row_gap.description: Set the size of the gap between the grid rows.

divider.label: Divider
divider.description: Show a divider between grid columns.

alignment.label: Alignment
alignment.description: Expand columns equally to always fill remaining space within the row, center them or align them to the left.

padding_remove_horizontal.description: Set the maximum content width. Note: The section may already have a maximum width, which you cannot exceed.

width_expand.label: Expand One Side
width_expand.description: Expand the width of one side to the left or right while the other side keeps within the constraints of the max width.

height_offset_top.description: Set a fixed height for all columns. They will keep their height when stacking. Optionally, subtract the header height to fill the first visible viewport.

margin_remove_bottom.description: Set the vertical margin. Note: The first grid's top margin and the last grid's bottom margin are always removed. Define those in the section settings instead.

parallax.label: Column Parallax
parallax.description: Set a parallax animation to move columns with different heights until they justify at the bottom. Mind that this disables the vertical alignment of elements in the columns.

status.label: Status
status.description: Disable the row and publish it later.

css.label: CSS
css.description: Enter your own custom CSS. The following selectors will be prefixed automatically for this element: .el-row

fields.description: The animation starts when the row enters the viewport and ends when it leaves the viewport. Optionally, set a start and end offset, e.g. 100px, 50vh or 50vh + 50%. Percent relates to the row's height.

video.label: Video
video.description: Select a video file or enter a link from YouTube or Vimeo.

title.label: Title
title.description: Enter a decorative section title which is aligned to the section edge.

overlap.description: Preserve the text color, for example when using cards. Section overlap is not supported by all styles and may have no visual effect.

_background_parallax_button.description: Define a custom background color or a color parallax animation instead of using a predefined style.

text_color.label: Text Color
text_color.description: Force a light or dark color for text, buttons and controls on the image or video background.

width_expand.label: Expand One Side
width_expand.description: Expand the width of one side to the left or right while the other side keeps within the constraints of the max width.

height_offset_top.description: Set a fixed height, and optionally subtract the header height to fill the first visible viewport. Alternatively, expand the height so the next section also fits the viewport, or on smaller pages to fill the viewport.

vertical_align.label: Vertical Alignment
vertical_align.description: Align the section content vertically, if the section height is larger than the content itself.

sticky.label: Sticky Effect
sticky.description: Sticky section will be covered by the following section while scrolling. Reveal section by previous section.

header_transparent_noplaceholder.description: Make the header transparent and overlay this section if it directly follows the header.

header_transparent_text_color.label: Header Text Color
header_transparent_text_color.description: Force a light or dark color for text, buttons and controls on the image or video background.

animation.label: Animation
animation.description: Apply an animation to elements once they enter the viewport. Slide animations can come into effect with a fixed offset or at 100% of the element size.

animation_delay.label: Animation Delay
animation_delay.description: Delay the element animations in milliseconds, e.g. 200.

title_position.label: Position
title_position.description: Define the title position within the section.

title_rotation.label: Rotation
title_rotation.description: Rotate the title 90 degrees clockwise or counterclockwise.

title_breakpoint.label: Breakpoint
title_breakpoint.description: Display the section title on the defined screen size and larger.

status.label: Status
status.description: Disable the section and publish it later.

css.label: CSS
css.description: Enter your own custom CSS. The following selectors will be prefixed automatically for this element: .el-section

media_focal_point.label: Focal Point
media_focal_point.description: Set a focal point to adjust the image focus when cropping.

image_loading.label: Loading
image_loading.description: By default, images are loaded lazy. Enable eager loading for images in the initial viewport.

image_size.label: Image Size
image_size.description: Determine whether the image will fit the section dimensions by clipping it or by filling the empty areas with the background color.

image_position.label: Image Position
image_position.description: Set the initial background position, relative to the section layer.

_image_parallax_button.description: Add a parallax effect or fix the background with regard to the viewport while scrolling.

media_visibility.label: Visibility
media_visibility.description: Display the image or video only on this device width and larger.

media_background.label: Background Color
media_background.description: Use the background color in combination with blend modes, a transparent image or to fill the area, if the image doesn't cover the whole section.

media_blend_mode.label: Blend Mode
media_blend_mode.description: Determine how the image or video will blend with the background color.

_media_overlay_parallax_button.description: Set an additional transparent overlay to soften the image or video.

fields.description: Set the width and height in pixels. Setting just one value preserves the original proportions. The image will be resized and cropped automatically.
fields.name: _image_dimension

fields.description: Set the video dimensions.
fields.name: _video_dimension

show_thumbnail.description: Show or hide content fields without the need to delete the content itself.
show_thumbnail.text: Show the navigation thumbnail instead of the image

slideshow_ratio.label: Ratio
slideshow_ratio.description: Set the slideshow ratio. It's recommended to use the same ratio as the image or video file. Simply use its width and height, e.g. 1600:900.

slideshow_min_height.label: Min Height
slideshow_min_height.description: Use an optional minimum height to prevent the slideshow from becoming smaller than its content on small devices.

text_color.label: Text Color
text_color.description: Set light or dark color mode for text, buttons and controls.

slideshow_box_shadow.label: Box Shadow
slideshow_box_shadow.description: Select the slideshow box shadow size.

slideshow_box_decoration.label: Box Decoration
slideshow_box_decoration.description: Select the image box decoration style.

slideshow_animation.label: Transition
slideshow_animation.description: Select the transition between two slides.

slideshow_velocity.label: Velocity
slideshow_velocity.description: Set the velocity in pixels per millisecond.

slideshow_autoplay_interval.label: Autoplay Interval
slideshow_autoplay_interval.description: Set the autoplay interval in seconds.

slideshow_parallax.label: Parallax
slideshow_parallax.description: Add a stepless parallax animation based on the scroll position.

slideshow_parallax_easing.label: Parallax Easing
slideshow_parallax_easing.description: Set the animation easing. Zero transitions at an even speed, a negative value starts off quickly while a positive value starts off slowly.

slideshow_parallax_target.label: Parallax Target
slideshow_parallax_target.description: The animation starts and stops depending on the element position in the viewport. Alternatively, use the position of a parent container.

slideshow_kenburns.label: Ken Burns Effect
slideshow_kenburns.description: Select the transformation origin for the Ken Burns animation.

slideshow_kenburns_duration.label: Ken Burns Duration
slideshow_kenburns_duration.description: Set the duration for the Ken Burns effect in seconds.

nav_position.label: Position
nav_position.description: Select the position of the navigation.

nav_position_margin.label: Margin
nav_position_margin.description: Apply a margin between the navigation and the slideshow container.

nav_breakpoint.label: Breakpoint
nav_breakpoint.description: Display the navigation only on this device width and larger.

nav_color.label: Color
nav_color.description: Set light or dark color if the navigation is below the slideshow.

thumbnav_nowrap.label: Thumbnav Wrap
thumbnav_nowrap.description: Define whether thumbnails wrap into multiple lines if the container is too small.

thumbnav_svg_inline.label: Thumbnav Inline SVG
thumbnav_svg_inline.description: Inject SVG images into the page markup so that they can easily be styled with CSS.

thumbnav_svg_color.label: Thumbnav SVG Color
thumbnav_svg_color.description: Select the SVG color. It will only apply to supported elements defined in the SVG.

slidenav.label: Position
slidenav.description: Select the position of the slidenav.

slidenav_margin.label: Margin
slidenav_margin.description: Apply a margin between the slidenav and the slideshow container.

slidenav_breakpoint.label: Breakpoint
slidenav_breakpoint.description: Display the slidenav only on this device width and larger.

slidenav_outside_breakpoint.label: Outside Breakpoint
slidenav_outside_breakpoint.description: Display the slidenav outside only on this device width and larger. Otherwise, display it inside.

slidenav_outside_color.label: Outside Color
slidenav_outside_color.description: Set light or dark color if the slidenav is outside.

overlay_container.label: Container Width
overlay_container.description: Set the maximum content width. Note: The section may already have a maximum width, which you cannot exceed.

overlay_container_padding.label: Container Padding
overlay_container_padding.description: Set the vertical container padding to position the overlay.

overlay_margin.label: Margin
overlay_margin.description: Set the margin between the overlay and the slideshow container.

overlay_style.label: Style
overlay_style.description: Select a style for the overlay.

overlay_padding.label: Padding
overlay_padding.description: Set the padding between the overlay and its content.

overlay_animation.label: Animation
overlay_animation.description: Choose between a parallax depending on the scroll position or an animation, which is applied once the slide is active.

image_loading.label: Loading
image_loading.description: By default, images are loaded lazy. Enable eager loading for images in the initial viewport.

title_font_family.description: Select an alternative font family. Mind that not all styles have different font families.

The slideshow always takes up full width, and the height will adapt automatically based on the defined ratio. Alternatively, the height can adapt to the height of the viewport.

Note: Make sure no height is set in the section settings when using one of the viewport options.
